bill.summary:
Discourage Dishonest Dialing Act
This bill requires the Federal Communications Commission to establish regulations requiring providers of voice services to implement caller-identification information-authentication technology that can:
verify that caller-identification information transmitted with a call is accurate, and alert a subscriber if a call cannot be verified.
